edu.OOSE.cs.jhu.group2.PopZombiesUI

Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    Game interface that brings the UI components together. Created with refence to http://www.kilobolt.com/game-development-tutorial.html
    Author:
    kilobolt, Connie Chang, Elaine Chao, Stephanie Chew, Ted Staley, Kevin Zhang

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Audio getAudio()
      Returns the Audio used for the game.
      Screen getCurrentScreen()
      Returns the Screen currently in use.
      Graphics getGraphics()
      Returns the Graphics used for the game.
      Screen getInitScreen()
      Returns the screen for initializing game.
      Input getInput()
      Returns the Input used for the game.
      void setScreen(Screen screen)
      Sets the current Screen.
